name: Boxen
description:
Boxen is a fresh, fun and HIGHLY ADDICTIVE block dropping puzzle game.

You are a monkey on a vine, swing down and drop colourful blocks in to a pit of chaos.

Match 4 of the same colour and cause chain reactions to score points and rescue your

grumpy friends that are trapped within.

Features a whole bunch of new levels EVERY WEEK, so you'll never get bored!

Add and challenge your friends to get the top scores. Watch replays to see how they did it and then beat them at their own game!

Two different game modes, "Puzzle Mode" where you must clear Grumpy blocks as quickly as possible and "Rush Mode" where you must score points by clearing blocks before they rise to the top.

Colour blind friendly mode available.
